name: Little flame (Moonin)
description:
Game made for Mini Jam 103 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-103-darkness).
The theme for the jam was "Darkness" and the limitation - "You are your own enemy".

The game tells a story of a little flame with love for flower picking. Unfortunately he is a bit too hot as the flowers die as he approaches them. 

Controls:
Keyboard - WSAD to move, Space to pick-up flowers.
Gamepad - Left Stick to move, South Button to pick-up flowers.
